text: Jennifer Elizabeth Randerson, Baroness Randerson (26 May 1948 â€“ 4 January 2025) was a Welsh Liberal Democrat member of the House of Lords from 2011 until her death.Notice of life peerage for Jenny Randerson, number10.gov.uk; accessed 20 March 2014. She was an Assembly Member for Cardiff Central from 1999 to 2011.Profile, BBC.co.uk; accessed 20 March 2014. Baroness Randerson died on 4 January 2025 in Cardiff, Wales at the age of 76. ==References== ==Other websites== *Jenny Randerson AM official biography at the Welsh Assembly website *Jenny Randerson AM profile at the site of Welsh Liberal Democrats * Category:1948 births Category:2025 deaths Category:Politicians from London Category:Politicians from Cardiff Category:Liberal Democrat Life Peers
title: Jenny Randerson, Baroness Randerson
